Lars Clausen wrote:

> By automatic checking of jar file dependencies, we found that the apache
> commons-cli class org.apache.commons.cli.TypeHandler has a dependency on
> org.apache.commons.lang.NumberUtils from common-lang.
>
> However, Heritrix doesn't seem to have a dependency on commons-lang.
>
> Is this deliberate, because the dependency will never be used by
> Heritrix usage of CLI, or is it just an oversight?

We mustn't be making use of TypeHandler otherwise I'd imagine there'd be 
compile-time complaints.  What tool are you using to do the dependency 
checking?
Yours,
St.Ack

>
> -Lars
